name: Paycor HCM, Inc.
description: Paycor HCM, Inc. is a leading provider of human capital management (HCM) solutions designed to assist businesses in managing their workforce effectively. Established in 1990 and headquartered in Cincinnati, Ohio, Paycor focuses on delivering innovative payroll, HR, and time and attendance solutions tailored for small to medium-sized businesses. The company's platform integrates payroll processing, talent management, and employee engagement tools, enabling organizations to streamline their human resources operations. Paycor’s mission is to empower business leaders with the insights and tools necessary to enhance employee productivity and drive organizational success. The company emphasizes user-friendly technology, offering a cloud-based platform that is easily accessible and customizable to meet the unique needs of its clients. Paycor’s commitment to customer service and support is evident through its dedicated account management and training resources, ensuring clients can maximize the value of their HCM solutions. With a focus on data security and compliance, Paycor helps businesses navigate the complexities of workforce management while reducing risk and administrative burden. As businesses increasingly recognize the importance of effective HCM strategies, Paycor continues to innovate and expand its offerings to remain at the forefront of the industry.

seo.meta_title: Paycor HCM, Inc. | Human Capital Management Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Paycor HCM, Inc., a leader in human capital management solutions for businesses. Discover innovative payroll, HR, and time management tools.

faq.question: What services does Paycor offer?
faq.answer: Paycor offers payroll processing, HR solutions, and time and attendance management.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Paycor?
faq.answer: Raul Villar Jr. is the CEO of Paycor HCM, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Paycor headquartered?
faq.answer: Paycor is headquartered in Cincinnati, Ohio, USA.
